TextView.android:text: Bommarillu Bhaskar: Bhaskar is a Telugu film director. In his early career, he worked as assistant director on films Bhadra and Arya. Dil Raju then gave him a chance to debut as director. His directorial debut was Bommarillu was a box-office hit. His next venture, Parugu, released on 1 May 2008. Allu Arjun starred in the lead role and Dil Raju produced it.Orange was his next film,which gained some mixed response.Now he started his fourth film with Ram with titleOngole Githa was released on Feb 1 2013, which was garned average response.
